benchmark_details.name: AgentRecBench
benchmark_details.overview: AgentRecBench is the first comprehensive benchmark for evaluating the emerging LLM-powered agentic recommender systems, providing standardized evaluation protocols to systematically assess these methods across diverse scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate both emerging agentic recommender systems and traditional recommendation methods across diverse scenarios.

data.source: Yelp, GoodReads, and Amazon datasets processed into a unified interaction environment.

methodology.calculation: Measured as the probability that the ground-truth item appears in the top-N ranked positions.
methodology.interpretation: A higher Hit Rate@ N indicates better recommendation performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Evaluated against 10 agentic and classic recommendation methods.
methodology.validation: Validated through the AgentSociety Challenge with numerous competing teams.
